channel.title: CVE Feed for WEN Themes -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for WEN Themes -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-27988|2024-08-02T00:41:55.965Z -- wen%20themes -- wen%20responsive%20columns
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in WEN Themes WEN Responsive Columns allows Stored XSS.This issue affects WEN Responsive Columns: from n/a through 1.3.2.
